table.name: vtiger_boletos
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_boletos` ( `boletosid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `registrodeventasid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `boleto1` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `boleto2` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `localizador` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `currency` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `boleto3` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_1605` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `boleto4` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `boleto5` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tipopasajero` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `boleto6` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `cantidad` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `boleto7` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `registrodeventaid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `fee` DECIMAL(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `boleto8` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `amount` DECIMAL(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `totalboletos` DECIMAL(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`boletosid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_boletoscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_boletoscf` ( `boletosid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`boletosid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
